game.title: The Lost Relic
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the cursed catacombs
game.description: An ancient relic has been stolen by evil forces and hidden within the cursed catacombs. Delve into the depths and retrieve the relic.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and a mystic sword

task.description: Find the entrance to the cursed catacombs and make your way in.
Defeat the creatures guarding the relic deep within the catacombs.
Locate the hidden chamber where the relic is kept and retrieve it.
